message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see several expense categories:
- Administrative Expenses: 1600726.63
- Selling Expenses: 477715.85
- Depreciation: 100239.89
- Financial Expenses: 657075.51

Among these, "Administrative Expenses" clearly represents the costs related to general management and administration of the entity. This is the standard accounting classification for such expenses.

The value for Administrative Expenses is 1600726.63.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1600726.63'}}
```
